title: The Temple of Saturn, with a Corner of the Arch of Septimus Severus in the Foreground
marks: Signature and watermark signed L margin: [Cavalier Piranesi F.]
description: 80; title on cartouche, towards L below: \"Veduta del Tempio detto della Concordia;\" black and white
